channel.title: [508] Thread-4 with info and lines

item.title: [508] Thread-4 with info and lines
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

This line seems like the most helpful part. This error is generally thrown when the JVM does not have enough memory for the given method to use, and therefore, it closes. To fix this, all you really have to do is increase the java heap space allocated to the program.

To find how to do that, use good ol’ Google. Just search for something like “increase java heap space command line”.

Read full topic
